Cherrycake\Modules\CacheProviderInterface

Interface for all cache providers

    Synopsis

    interface CacheProviderInterface {
    • // methods
    • public bool set()
    • public mixed get()
    • public bool delete()
    • public mixed increment()
    • public bool append()
    • public bool isKey()
    • public void touch()
    }

    Methods

    public

    • append() — Appends the given value to the existent value in the cache. The key must already exists, or error will be returned.
    • delete() — Deletes a value from the cache.
    • get() — Gets a value from the cache.
    • increment() — Increments a number stored in the cache by the given step
    • isKey() — Checks whether a value is stored or not in the cache.
    • set() — Stores a value in cache.
    • touch() — Stablishes a new expiration TTL for an element in the cache.
